title: Kydee
description: In the freezing cold of winter, a tiny kitten lies shivering in wait. A mere eight weeks old, she is curled up behind the wheel of a car. All she wants is someone to love her. Kydee is an adorable little kitten who finds a wonderful home after a rough beginning. Her curiosity and playful nature bring so much joy to everyone who knows her!
author: Dawn Doig
